existing_features.title: Add a clearly visible, one-tap "Quick Exit" panic/abort control that is accessible from anywhere in the authenticated app UI (e.g., in the sticky header) and immediately redirects the current tab to a weather report website to disguise reporting activity.

Provide a simple in-app way to configure the Quick Exit destination URL (weather report website) and persist it locally on the device (so it works without requiring login or backend changes). Include safe validation and a default value if none is set.

Add an optional fast activation shortcut for Quick Exit (keyboard shortcut on desktop and an additional placement within the incident reporting flow) without interfering with form submission or other critical actions.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a panic/abort button that quickly redirects to a weather report website to disguise reporting activity

projectName: Add panic/abort (quick-exit) button that redirects to a weather website
